profile.name: Osiel Ordo√±ez
profile.subtitle: Web Developer
profile.fact1: Nice to meet you, welcome to my portfolio!
profile.fact2: I love programming, designing, and learning new things!
profile.fact3: Feel free to contact me or take a look at my work.

project1.title: LinkFood
project1.description: LinkFood is a web system dedicated to restaurant needs, from a virtual menu like Rappi to order management and sales statistics.

subproject1.title: Online Menu
subproject1.description: This module corresponds to the online menu, where users can view information about the restaurant, such as hours, locations, and social media, as well as browse products and place orders.

subproject2.title: Order and Command Management
subproject2.description: This module is accessed by waiters and cashiers, where they can create tables, register orders, process payments, and review past orders.

subproject3.title: Admin Module
subproject3.description: In this module, products, categories, and their options are registered, the restaurant information is customized, and sales statistics are displayed.

project2.title: Goods and Services Reception
project2.description: This consists of a simple application with Bootstrap modals, searchable selectors, data tables, and PDF report generation.

project3.title: Vikitech
project3.description: Vikitech is an e-commerce system that allows showcasing store products, creating a shopping cart, and placing orders. On the admin side, categories, products, and ads can be customized, along with order management.

date1.title: State Government
date1.description: During my time here, I developed complete systems on the Google Appsheet platform, which have been very useful for the secretariat.

date2.title: COBAT | Internship
date2.description: During my internship, I developed a system for uploading and managing educational materials for COBAT students.

date3.title: Mi Rayotaxi
date3.description: I collaborated with other developers to implement features in a taxi system similar to Uber.
